top.title: Japan's governing party projected to win snap election majority
top.summary: A coalition led by current Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi is expected to clinch a decisive win, according to media projections after polls closed.

top.title: Polls close in Thai election pitting reformists against conservatives
top.summary: Thai voters are choosing between sweeping change or more of the same in an election called after several coalition governments collapsed.

top.title: Russia names three suspects over shooting of general
top.summary: The suspects include the alleged gunman, Lyubomir Korba, whom Russia says fled to the UAE after the attack.

top.title: Baldur's Gate to be turned into TV series - without the game's developers
top.summary: The show will be made by Craig Mazin, who co-created the acclaimed game adaptation The Last Of Us.

top.title: Uber ordered to pay $8.5m over claim driver raped passenger
top.summary: The verdict is expected to influence the outcome of thousands of other cases against the ride hailing firm.

top.title: Google staff call for firm to cut ties with ICE
top.summary: More than 900 Google employees signed a letter opposing company links to federal immigration actions.

title.#text: Digital car keys are getting more sophisticated
Netflix’s Warner Bros. merger puts rival streamers in survival mode
Former Tumblr head Jeff D’Onofrio steps in as acting CEO at the Washington Post
